featured.text: In 1968, he began to turn away from photography and returned to his passion for drawing and painting.
Cartier-Bresson’s approach to photography remained much the same throughout his life.
He quit photography right after the publication of The Decisive Moment.
He devoted himself to photography all his life.
He developed a passion for photography when he traveled to Africa.

other.text: And Africa fueled another interest in him: photography.
Which of the following is true about Cartier-Bresson’s career in photography?
Which of the following is true about Cartier-Bresson’s approach to photography?

definition.zh_def: 攝影是一種藝術和技術，通過捕捉光線來創造圖像。
definition.en_def: Photography is the art and technique of capturing images by recording light.
definition.example: She has a passion for photography and often takes her camera on trips.
